features: 【Wide Compatible Full-Size Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo】The Colorful Keyboard with number pad and mice combo add vitality to your Desktop. Improve work efficiency. Works with your PC, desktop computer, laptop.

【Reliable 2.4G Wireless Connection, Plug and Play】 Provide anti-interference stable transmission and make sure you to enjoy the wireless freedom, just plug and play, reliable wireless connection up to 10 meters(33 ft) away with virtually no delays or dropouts.(usb receiver that cleverly stores inside your mouse back).

【Ergonomic Design】Wireless keyboard is ergonomically designed with folding holder and anti-slide pads that can keep it at an optimum slope, prevent your wrists from hurting while long sessions of typing.The wireless mouse in contoured shape would provide hours of work comfortably. And Removable keycaps, easy to clean dust.

【With Auto-Sleep Feature】The ergonomic wireless keyboard is powered by 1 AA battery, and the wireless mouse is powered by 1 AA batteries. While not using for 8-10 minuts, will enter auto-sleep mode, that saves battery life and reduce battery replacement. allowing for 18 months of keyboard use and 18 months of mouse use, battery life may vary based on user and computing conditions.

【Colorful Cute Wireless Keyboard and Mouse & Best Office Gift】MOFII is committed to creating high-quality colorful wireless keyboard and mouse, perfect for office/home workers. And it is also the good choice for your friend's Birthday, Christmas or New Year gift list. Choose MOFII, you’ll enjoy enjoy 30 days money-back and 12-month worry-free warranty.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: MOFII Colorful Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo MOFII is professional in providing Colorful Keyboard and Mouse Combo. We take advantage of our experienced quality control and supply chain to bring you “Quality products that exceed end-user expectations. 2.4 GHz wireless technology delivers a reliable connection with up to a 10M range;Works with your PC, desktop computer, laptop or notebook. Compatible with Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 /10 operating systems;Auto sleep/wake smart keyboard and mouse and conserves the battery life without the hassle of changing batteries;Features 13 multimedia hotkeys for instant access to the Internet, email, play/pause, and volume so you can easily check out your favorite sites;Wireless keyboard is ergonomically designed with folding holder and anti-slide pads that can keep it at an optimum slope, prevent your wrists from hurting while long sessions of typing. .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this keyboard! The keys have a pleasant quiet thonk sound and the round keys were not difficult to adapt to. It looks beautiful without losing any functionality. There is no back lighting though.The included mouse is cute and has a button to adjust curser speed. There is plastic on the bottom pads when it arrives; if you don't take it off, the mouse will have some drag. After a few minutes of disuse, the mouse will automatically turn off. To awaken it, just click a button and it'll start responding immediately.There is a single receiver for both the keyboard and mouse, which is great to reduce the number of ports you have to use if you plan to use both items. Both items require one AA battery apiece. There is no software you have to install to use these either.Edit: I have since ordered and received a second keyboard/mouse combo in the "Off White" set. The mouse for this set does not have an on/off switch but the "Light Off-White Colorful" one pictured does have a switch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I did not like the mouse it came with, compared to the keyboard it isn’t cute in my opinion. So I paired it with a Logitech one.They keyboard itself was easy to set up & responds very well when typing. It seems the keys are fully colored so I’m hoping there is no fading when it comes to the colors like other brands I saw that had a similar style. The sound is so soothing to me so I love it! Of course the keyboard is so cute and not even a day of using it and I got so many compliments!I noticed other comments mention the closeness of the keys but honestly I haven’t found them to be different spatially from other keyboard, so really it feels very easy to use!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes Typing Easier and Error Free
reviews.reviewText: I love the bright and beautiful colors. The keystroke has a little noise, but not much more than others.It’s easy to get going - Plug in the USB Dongle add a AA battery to the keyboard and one to the mouse and you’re good to go!It was packed securely in shipping. The keyboard is of good quality, when typing the keyboard is durable. It is still lightweight and wireless, therefore portable.I know that it’s great for gaming, but I purchased this keyboard for the raised keys feature. My nails are naturally very long and I don’t want to cut them, unfortunately at times this can make it hard to type.Regular keyboards have flat and flush keys. I found that I would hit several keys causing many typos.My typing accuracy has improved and I love the look of it. I love it enough that I got 2, one for home and the office. It is a great buy and I would recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Keyboard is great, mouse is ehh
reviews.reviewText: Keyboard and mouse both look great, set everything up and both worked right away. The keyboard is super cute and goes perfectly with the Cinnamoroll theme I have for my desk! Keys are much quieter than my previous mechanical keyboard (razer huntsman) but feel nice to press, some slight lag when typing quickly for more than 10 or so seconds but not really bothersome.The mouse, for me, wasn't useable. There was too much lag when moving across the screen and the clicks weren't precise, used it for about 20 minutes and even playing solitaire was a little frustrating so I turned it off. Luckily the keyboard works just fine with the mouse turned off, so you can use them separately! I expected to not be able to use the mouse, since I also use this computer for gaming and didn't think a wireless mouse would work out, so still happy to have the cute keyboard.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is the second keyboard I’ve had like this, cutest thing ever and works well. Easy to hook up. It’s not super “clicky” but louder than a regular keyboard which I like.Batteries needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute & aesthetically pleasing! Satisfying to type on!
reviews.reviewText: I got tons of compliments on this at work and it’s so nice to type on! Gives a modern but still type writer like feel which I love. The fact I get a matching mouse with it too is great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really like the keyboard but the battery compartment is to loose and the battery wouldn't power up or stay on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great keyboard for casual use but not for me
reviews.reviewText: Aesthetic and looks:When I first saw this keyboard I really liked the look and aesthetic of it and in person, it's exactly as it looked in the picture. I loved the sound the keys made and the feel of the actual keys on my hand as it felt exactly like a typewriter,Practicality:This is where overall I give it a 3. I wish I could give it a 3.5 as it wasn't a bad keyboard. It was nice, it looked and sounded amazing but it was slow to respond when I typed and it can slow down my machine. (However, I'm not sure if it's my machine or the product but when I tested it on another keyboard my machine was the same in responsiveness. I have a Macbook Pro) and there is no on/off function. It does have a sleep mode however it can be a little difficult to determine the sleep mode but when in use again after sleep mode it does respond fairly quickly.For my personal preference, however, the keys are a little close together which slowed down my writing and caused numerous mistakes that I later fixed. It's not a huge problem (barely a problem really I would just mention it) but it's more a personal preference.Overall it wasn't a bad keyboard and it can be excellent for casual usage and even professional use if you don't mind the close keys. (Really I'm being picky) and it would be an excellent piece to add to your desk however if you plan to use this keyboard heavily (I'm an author) it can slow you down and if you don't constantly use it, the keyboard will go to sleep on you and you have to move the mouse around or tap a few keys to 'wake it up'. Overall nice product but not for me.
